fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Single market, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives: Consumer Product Safety, Toy Safety, Cybersecurity, Personal Protective Equipment, Ecolabelling, Medical Devices, Trade, EU-China Relations, EU-India relations, Food
organisation_name: The International Federation of Inspection Agencies (IFIA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on liability and new technologies #E03592#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3592#Member#C#Product Liability Directive formation
membership: IFIA has a formal memorandum of understanding with CEOC, a Brussels based association with a similar mandate.
relevant_communication: IFIA publishes surveys relating to various relevant activities on a frequent basis, including Consumer Product Safety
goals__remit: IFIA aims to improve the methods, standards, safety procedures and rules used by its members for the benefit of both them and their stakeholders. IFIA works closely with governments, ngos and other trade bodies in the realisation of its objectives.
